section.title: The note element

list.item: A note or annotation in a document.

section.p: The note element represents a generic document note or annotation. It may be used as a root element in DML islands in non-DML documents.

section.p: The role attribute may be used to provide a form to refine the note element meaning. Allowed values are:

item.p: A note that is isolated from the main narrative flow.
A footnote. Footnotes in paged media usually occur at the end of the page that reference it.
